name: Neu Berliner
tagline: A lightweight framework for Coffeescript apps.
body:
## Neu Berliner

Inspired heavily by Berliner, another framework doing the same thing. The idea is to write quick web apps in Coffeescript. 

### Sample

Here's a simple example:

```coffeescript

app = require 'neu-berliner'

app.get '/', -> 'Hello, world!'

app.run 4567

```

Fairly simple, as you can see. You can find some more details [here](https://github/com/rudimk/neu-berliner).

### Future plans

None, for now, although the library may be tested with io.js, and possibly even extended, to make sure it's compatible.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
